channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NJ
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NJ

item.title: Report X-2024010350
item.description:
Report X-2024010350

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-12T18:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-27
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package arrived at hazmat cage during the sunrise sort in a plastic bin. DescribePack: Inspection showed package of "SIMONIZ PRO MAGIC YELLOW" to be wet from internal leakage, with 1 loose cap. Damage most likely caused from being dropped or mishandled. DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: Remaining content will be returned to shipper in a salvage drum, unless otherwise stated.

item.title: Report X-2023120677
item.description:
Report X-2023120677

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-09
  • City: TRENTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Cap on bottle was loose causing contents to leak during transit. Upon discovery the box was placed in a red tote and moved into the hazmat cage DescribePack: Cap was not on the bottle securley DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: box was placed in a red tote and moved into the hazmat cage

item.title: Report X-2024010022
item.description:
Report X-2024010022

  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: CALL TO UNLOAD FOR LEAKING PACKING, WHEN ARRIVED RESPONDER NOTICED THIS PACKAGE WET, UPON FURTHER INVESTIGATION FOUND THE CAP WAS LOOSE AND THE SECURITY TAP UNDER THE LID WAS SLIGHTLY POPPED UP. PROCESSED THROUGH THE DMP.

item.title: Report I-2023120004

Report I-2023120004

  • State: NJ

  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1 x glass bottle of UN1266 Undeclared DG in fibreboard outer package(non un spec). discovered due to leak/odor. no dg markings or labels. spill cleaned locally and secured in salvage drum for FAA inspection.
